name: Learning python
tagline: Learn Python with these handy cue cards
body:
Learning Python Cue Cards

Python is a great language to understand and learn and it fulfills part
of the Computing curriculum for KS2-4.
These cards can be used for presentations, or given to classes to work through.

These files are to be used in the context of learning Python 2.7, not 
Python 3.0.


You are free to reuse these cards and remix them to meet your needs, they are
provided under a Creative Commons licence CC-BY-SA.


This work is an expansion on David Whale's work which can be found here
http://blog.whaleygeek.co.uk/python-flashcards/

Enjoy learning Python.

Les Pounder
http://bigl.es
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
